trans-unit.source: Next, we get all the p elements that are descendants of the body via
trans-unit.target: 接下来,我们通过以下方式得到所有的p元素,它们是主体的后代

trans-unit.source: Next, we grab the time domain data and copy it into our array
trans-unit.target: 接下来,我们抓取时域数据,并将其复制到我们的数组中。

trans-unit.source: Next, we have a <canvas> element into which the captured frames are stored, potentially manipulated in some way, and then converted into an output image file. This canvas is kept hidden by styling the canvas with display:none, to avoid cluttering up the screen — the user does not need to see this intermediate stage.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们有一个 <canvas> 元素，将捕获的帧存储在其中，可能以某种方式进行处理，然后转换为输出图像文件。通过使用 display :none 设置画布的样式，可以使该画布保持隐藏状态，以避免使屏幕混乱—用户无需查看此中间阶段。

trans-unit.source: Next, we have two form inputs that allow you to set the anchorOffset and focusOffset — they both have a default value of 0.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们有两个表单输入，可用于设置 anchorOffset 和 focusOffset －它们的默认值均为0。

trans-unit.source: Next, we iterate over each octave in the note frequencies table. For each octave, we use Object.entries() to get a list of the notes in that octave.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们遍历音符频率表中的每个八度。对于每个八度，我们使用 Object.entries() 获取该八度中的音符列表。

trans-unit.source: Next, we need to establish our event handlers to change the text content of the box when the transition begins and ends.
trans-unit.target: 接下来,我们需要建立我们的事件处理程序,以便在过渡开始和结束时改变盒子的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: Next, we need to figure out which voice to use. We use the HTMLSelectElementselectedOptions property to return the currently selected <option> element. We then use this element's data-name attribute, finding the SpeechSynthesisVoice object whose name matches this attribute's value. We set the matching voice object to be the value of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.voice property.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们需要弄清楚要使用哪种声音。我们使用 HTMLSelectElement selectedOptions 属性返回当前选择的 <option> 元素。然后，我们使用该元素的 data-name 属性，查找其名称与该属性的值匹配的 SpeechSynthesisVoice 对象。我们将匹配的语音对象设置为 SpeechSynthesisUtterance.voice 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Next, we post a confirmation message back to the main page via the message channel by calling MessagePort.postMessage on MessageChannel.port2 that was initially transfered to the IFrame.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们通过调用最初已传输到IFrame的 MessageChannel.port2 上的 MessagePort.postMessage ，通过消息通道将确认消息发布回主页。

trans-unit.source: Next, we set up an event listener for the "Apply Constraints" button. If it's clicked and there's not already media in use, we call startVideo(), and let that function handle starting the stream with the specified settings in place. Otherwise, we follow these steps to apply the updated constraints to the already-active stream:
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们为“应用约束”按钮设置一个事件侦听器。如果单击它，并且尚未使用任何媒体，则调用 startVideo() ，然后让该函数处理具有指定设置的流来启动流。否则，我们将按照以下步骤将更新的约束应用于已处于活动状态的流：

trans-unit.source: Next, we set up the cone of our spatialised sound, determining the area in which it can be heard:
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们设置空间声音的音锥，确定可以听到的区域：

trans-unit.source: Next, we start our draw() function off, again setting up a loop with requestAnimationFrame() so that the displayed data keeps updating, and clearing the display with each animation frame.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们关闭 draw() 函数，再次使用 requestAnimationFrame() 设置循环，以便显示的数据不断更新，并清除每个动画帧的显示。

trans-unit.source: Next, we start the process of actually rendering the scene onto the canvas, by setting the canvas to fill the entire browser viewport, and running the rendering loop (drawScene()) for the first time. This is the non-WebVR — normal — rendering loop.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们通过将画布设置为填充整个浏览器视口，并首次运行渲染循环（ drawScene() ），开始将场景实际渲染到画布上的过程。这是非WebVR（正常）渲染循环。

trans-unit.source: Next, we style the Information screen (wrapped in an <aside> element) how we want it, give it fixed position so that it doesn't appear in the layout flow and affect the main UI, transform it to the position we want it to sit in by default, and give it a transition for smooth showing/hiding:
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们按照需要的方式设置信息屏幕（包装在 <aside> 元素中）的样式，为其固定位置，使其不出现在布局流程中并影响主UI，将其转换为所需的位置默认情况下坐在其中，并对其进行过渡以使其平滑显示/隐藏：

trans-unit.source: Next, we update the progress and status information if any tasks have been enqueued.
trans-unit.target: 接下来,如果有任务被排队,我们会更新进度和状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Next, we use the ServiceWorkerContainer.register() function to register the service worker for this site, which is just a JavaScript file residing inside our app (note this is the file's URL relative to the origin, not the JS file that references it.)
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们使用 ServiceWorkerContainer.register() 函数为该站点注册服务工作者，这只是驻留在我们应用程序中的一个JavaScript文件（请注意，这是相对于来源的文件URL，而不是引用该URL的JS文件。 ）

trans-unit.source: Next, we used a loop to create the <tr> elements, which are children of the <tbody> element.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们使用循环来创建<tr>元素，这些元素是<tbody>元素的子元素。

trans-unit.source: Nodes
trans-unit.target: Nodes

trans-unit.source: Nodes and elements in a document may be dragged using the application/x-moz-node type. The data for the type should be a DOM node. This allows the drop target to receive the actual node where the drag was started from. Note that callers from a different domain will not be able to access the node even when it has been dropped.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 application/x-moz-node 类型拖动文档中的节点和元素。该类型的数据应为DOM节点。这允许放置目标接收拖动开始的实际节点。请注意，即使已删除该节点，来自其他域的呼叫者也将无法访问该节点。

trans-unit.source: Nodes can be removed. The following code removes text node myTextNode (containing the word "world") from the second <p> element, myP.
trans-unit.target: 可以删除节点。以下代码从第二个 <p> 元素 myP 中删除文本节点 myTextNode （包含单词“ world”）。

trans-unit.source: Nodes from external documents should be cloned using document.importNode() (or adopted using document.adoptNode()) before they can be inserted into the current document. For more on the Node.ownerDocument issues, see the W3C DOM FAQ.
trans-unit.target: 外部文档中的节点应使用 document.importNode() 进行克隆（或使用 document.adoptNode() 进行采用），然后才能插入当前文档。有关 Node.ownerDocument 问题的更多信息，请参见W3C DOM FAQ。

trans-unit.source: Noise suppression automatically filters the audio to remove background noise, hum caused by equipment, and the like from the sound before delivering it to your code. This feature is typically used on microphones, although it is technically possible it could be provided by other input sources as well.
trans-unit.target: 噪声抑制自动过滤音频,以去除背景噪声、设备引起的嗡嗡声等,然后再将其传送到您的代码中。这一功能通常用于麦克风,尽管从技术上讲,它也可以由其他输入源提供。

trans-unit.source: Noise suppression is typically provided by microphones, although it can be provided by other input sources as well.
trans-unit.target: 噪声抑制通常由麦克风提供,但也可以由其他输入源提供。

trans-unit.source: Noise user controls
trans-unit.target: 噪声用户控制

trans-unit.target: 不破损空间

trans-unit.source: Note also that only start and final endpoints of a path are affected: if a path is closed with closePath(), there's no start and final endpoint; instead, all endpoints in the path are connected to their attached previous and next segment using the current setting of the lineJoin style, whose default value is miter, with the effect of automatically extending the outer borders of the connected segments to their intersection point, so that the rendered stroke will exactly cover full pixels centered at each endpoint if those connected segments are horizontal and/or vertical). See the next two sections for demonstrations of these additional line styles.
trans-unit.target: 还要注意，仅影响路径的起点和终点：如果使用 closePath() 关闭路径，则没有起点和终点。取而代之的是，使用 lineJoin 样式的当前设置将路径中的所有端点连接到其连接的上一个和下一个分段，其默认值为 miter ，其作用是自动将连接的分段的外边界扩展到其交点，因此如果这些连接的段是水平和/或垂直的，则渲染的笔触将准确覆盖以每个端点为中心的完整像素。有关这些其他线条样式的演示，请参见以下两节。

trans-unit.source: Note also, that various browsers ignore the result of the event and do not ask the user for confirmation at all. The document will always be unloaded automatically. Firefox has a switch named dom.disable_beforeunload in about:config to enable this behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 还要注意，各种浏览器都忽略事件的结果，根本不要求用户进行确认。该文档将始终自动被卸载。Firefox 在about：config中有一个名为 dom.disable_beforeunload 的开关来启用此行为。

trans-unit.source: Note each handler calls preventDefault() to prevent additional event processing for this event (such as touch events or pointer events).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，每个处理程序都调用 preventDefault() 以防止对此事件进行其他事件处理（例如，触摸事件或指针事件）。

trans-unit.source: Note that as of Firefox 40, IndexedDB transactions have relaxed durability guarantees to increase performance (see bug 1112702.) Previously in a readwrite transaction IDBTransaction.oncomplete was fired only when all data was guaranteed to have been flushed to disk. In Firefox 40+ the complete event is fired after the OS has been told to write the data but potentially before that data has actually been flushed to disk. The complete event may thus be delivered quicker than before, however, there exists a small chance that the entire transaction will be lost if the OS crashes or there is a loss of system power before the data is flushed to disk. Since such catastrophic events are rare most consumers should not need to concern themselves further.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，从Firefox 40开始，IndexedDB事务具有宽松的持久性保证，以提高性能（请参阅bug1112702。）以前，在 readwrite 事务中，仅当确保已将所有数据刷新到磁盘时才触发 IDBTransaction.oncomplete 。在Firefox 40+中，会在操作系统被告知写入数据后但可能实际上未将数据刷新到磁盘之前触发 complete 事件。该 complete 因此，事件传递的速度可能比以前更快，但是，如果OS崩溃或在将数据刷新到磁盘之前失去系统电源，则很有可能丢失整个事务。由于这种灾难性事件很少发生，因此大多数消费者不需要进一步担心自己。

trans-unit.source: Note that being indirect-modify (changeable but only having read-methods), rules are NOT added or removed from the list directly, but instead here, only via its parent stylesheet. In fact, .insertRule() and .deleteRule() are not even methods of CSSRuleList, but only of CSSStyleSheet. If however, for some reason the list does need to be modified but has no parent stylesheet (perhaps being a livecopy of a list that does), it cannot just be assigned one (as it has no such property), and neither can it be assigned to one (as stylesheet.cssRules is read-only), but it must unfortunately be inserted into one, rule by rule, and unless combining lists, after any existing list therein is deleted, rule by rule.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于是间接修改（可更改，但仅具有读取方法），因此不会直接在列表中添加或删除规则，而是在此处仅通过其父样式表添加或删除规则。实际上， .insertRule() 和 .deleteRule() 甚至不是CSSRuleList的方法，而仅仅是 CSSStyleSheet 的方法。但是，如果由于某种原因确实需要修改列表但没有父样式表（也许是列表的实时副本），则不能仅为其分配一个（因为它没有此类属性），也不能分配给一个（因为stylesheet.css Rules 是只读的），但必须将其按规则插入一个规则中，除非合并列表，否则删除其中的任何现有列表后，应按规则进行。

trans-unit.source: Note that the maximum precision of suspension is the size of the render quantum and the specified suspension time will be rounded down to the nearest render quantum boundary. For this reason, it is not allowed to schedule multiple suspends at the same quantized frame. Also scheduling should be done while the context is not running to ensure the precise suspension.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,暂停的最大精度是渲染量子的大小,指定的暂停时间将被四舍五入到最近的渲染量子边界。因此,不允许在同一量化帧调度多个暂停。同时调度应在上下文未运行时进行,以确保精确的暂停。

trans-unit.source: Note that there are two different types of readable stream. As well as the conventional readable stream there is a type called a byte stream — this is an extended version of a conventional stream for reading underlying byte sources (otherwise known as BYOB, or “bring your own buffer”) sources. These allow streams to be read straight into a buffer supplied by the developer, minimizing the copying required. Which underlying stream (and by extension, reader and controller) your code will use depends on how the stream was created in the first place (see the ReadableStream.ReadableStream() constructor page).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，有两种不同类型的可读流。与常规的可读流一样，还有一种称为字节流的类型-这是常规流的扩展版本，用于读取底层的字节源（也称为BYOB，或“带上自己的缓冲区”）源。这些允许将流直接读取到开发人员提供的缓冲区中，从而最大程度地减少了所需的复制。您的代码将使用哪个基础流（以及扩展名，读取器和控制器）取决于流的创建方式（请参阅 ReadableStream.ReadableStream() 构造函数页面）。

trans-unit.source: Note, in the above example, a more verbose XPath is preferred over common shortcuts such as //h2. Generally, more specific XPath selectors as in the above example usually gives a significant performance improvement, especially on very large documents. This is because the evaluation of the query spends does not waste time visiting unnecessary nodes. Using // is generally slow as it visits every node from the root and all subnodes looking for possible matches.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在上面的示例中，比普通的快捷方式（例如 //h2 )更优选使用更详细的XPath 。通常，上面示例中更具体的XPath选择器通常会显着提高性能，尤其是在非常大的文档上。这是因为对查询花费的评估不会浪费时间访问不必要的节点。使用//通常较慢，因为它会从根目录访问所有节点，并访问所有子节点以寻找可能的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Note: The StereoPannerNode is for simple cases in which you just want stereo panning from left to right. There is also a PannerNode, which allows for a great deal of control over 3D space, or sound spatialisation, for creating more complex effects. This is used in games and 3D apps to create birds flying overhead, or sound coming from behind the user for instance.
trans-unit.target: 注意： StereoPannerNode 仅用于简单的情况，您只需要从左到右进行立体声平移。还有一个 PannerNode ，它可以对3D空间或声音空间进行大量控制，以创建更复杂的效果。在游戏和3D应用中使用它来创建飞过头顶的鸟或声音，例如来自用户背后的声音。

trans-unit.target: 注意：标识符“ experimental-webgl ”或“ experimental-webgl2 ”也用于WebGL的实现中。这些实现尚未达到测试套件的一致性，或者平台上的图形驱动程序状况还不稳定。该Khronos组织证明在一定的WebGL实现的一致性规则。

trans-unit.source: Notice in the above document.body has been used as the context instead of document so the XPath starts from the body element. (In this example, the "." is important to indicate that the querying should start from the context node, document.body. If the "." was left out (leaving //h2) the query would start from the root node (html) which would be more wasteful.)

trans-unit.source: Notice the difference between selection and focus. Document.activeElement returns the focused element.

trans-unit.source: Notice the first frame contains an entire message (has FIN=1 and opcode!=0x0), so the server can process or respond as it sees fit. The second frame sent by the client has a text payload (opcode=0x1), but the entire message has not arrived yet (FIN=0). All remaining parts of that message are sent with continuation frames (opcode=0x0), and the final frame of the message is marked by FIN=1. Section 5.4 of the spec describes message fragmentation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，第一帧包含完整的消息（具有 FIN=1 和 opcode!=0x0 ），因此服务器可以根据需要进行处理或响应。客户端发送的第二帧具有文本有效负载（ opcode=0x1 ），但是整个消息尚未到达（ FIN=0 ）。该消息的所有其余部分都带有连续帧（ opcode=0x0 ）发送，并且消息的最后一帧用 FIN=1 标记。规范的5.4节描述了消息分段。

trans-unit.source: Now all that's left to do is make sure we've loaded the sample before we are able to play the instrument. We'll add a loading screen that disappears when the file has been fetched and decoded, then we can allow the scheduler to start using the play button click event.
trans-unit.target: 现在剩下要做的就是确保在能够演奏乐器之前已经加载了样本。我们将添加一个加载屏幕，该加载屏幕在文件被提取和解码后消失，然后我们可以允许调度程序使用播放按钮click事件开始。

trans-unit.source: Now all three animations are linked to just one duration, which we can change easily from one place.
trans-unit.target: 现在,所有三个动画都只链接到一个持续时间,我们可以很容易地从一个地方改变它。

trans-unit.source: Now consider each of these two calls to removeEventListener():
trans-unit.target: 现在考虑对 removeEventListener() 的两个调用：

trans-unit.source: Now consider this:
trans-unit.target: 现在考虑一下。

trans-unit.source: Now for a real example — what if we wanted to load images dynamically, but we wanted to make sure the images were loaded before we tried to display them? This is a standard thing to want to do, but it can be a bit of a pain. We can use .onload to only display the image after it’s loaded, but what about events that start happening before we start listening to them? We could try to work around this using .complete, but it’s still not foolproof, and what about multiple images? And, ummm, it’s still synchronous, so blocks the main thread.
trans-unit.target: 现在举一个真实的例子-如果我们想动态加载图像，但又想确保在尝试显示图像之前已加载图像该怎么办？这是要执行的标准操作，但可能会有些麻烦。我们可以使用 .onload 仅在加载图像后显示图像，但是在开始监听图像之前发生的事件又如何呢？我们可以尝试使用 .complete 来解决此问题，但是它仍然不是万无一失的，那么多张图像呢？而且，嗯，它仍然是同步的，因此阻塞了主线程。

trans-unit.source: Now for the dedicated pointer lock event listener: pointerlockchange. When this occurs, we run a function called lockChangeAlert() to handle the change.
trans-unit.target: 现在为专用的指针锁定事件侦听器： pointerlockchange 。发生这种情况时，我们运行一个名为 lockChangeAlert() 的函数来处理更改。

trans-unit.source: Now it’s time to bring them both together with the Element.animate() method:
trans-unit.target: 现在是时候将它们与 Element.animate() 方法结合在一起了：

trans-unit.source: Now it's time to start building the list. First, the list is emptied by setting listing.innerHTML to be empty. That leaves us with an empty ul to begin inserting directory entries into.
trans-unit.target: 现在是时候开始构建列表了。首先，通过将 listing.innerHTML 设置为空来清空列表。这给我们留下了一个空的 ul ,可以开始将目录条目插入其中。

trans-unit.source: Now let’s get on to service workers!
trans-unit.target: 现在，让我们继续服务工人！

trans-unit.source: Now let’s return to our original problem. What we want is to be able to replace the whole text with new text. That’s where replaceWholeText() comes in:
trans-unit.target: 现在让我们回到我们原来的问题。我们想要的是能够用新文本替换整个文本。那是 replaceWholeText() 出现的地方：

trans-unit.source: Now let’s try creating the same animation with the Web Animations API.
trans-unit.target: 现在，让我们尝试使用Web Animations API创建相同的动画。

trans-unit.source: Now let's check out the JavaScript. First we'll define the two objects that describe the keyframes and the timing configuration to use, then we'll actually see the code that triggers and runs the animation when the "animateButton" button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 现在，让我们看看JavaScript。首先，我们将定义两个对象，这些对象描述要使用的关键帧和时序配置，然后我们将实际看到单击 "animateButton" 按钮时触发并运行动画的代码。

trans-unit.source: Now let's get our response data:
trans-unit.target: 现在让我们得到我们的响应数据。

trans-unit.source: Now let's have a look at the JavaScript code; this is where the majority of the action happens, after all!
trans-unit.target: 现在让我们来看看JavaScript代码,毕竟这是大部分操作发生的地方。

trans-unit.source: Now let's look at a more complex createBuffer() example, in which we create a two second buffer, fill it with white noise, and then play it via an AudioBufferSourceNode. The comment should clearly explain what is going on. You can also run the code live, or view the source.
trans-unit.target: 现在，让我们看一个更复杂的 createBuffer() 示例，其中创建一个两秒钟的缓冲区，用白噪声填充它，然后通过 AudioBufferSourceNode 播放它。评论应清楚地说明正在发生的事情。您还可以实时运行代码，或查看源代码。

In the final then, we'll have first-party storage access.

trans-unit.source: Now that the document structure is defined, construct the JavaScript code that will do the work. The goal: to be able to add requests to call functions to a queue, with an idle callback that runs those functions whenever the system is idle for long enough a time to make progress.
trans-unit.target: 既然文档结构已经定义好了,那就来构造做工作的JavaScript代码吧。目标是:能够将调用函数的请求添加到队列中,只要系统闲置的时间足够长,就会有一个空闲回调来运行这些函数,以取得进展。

trans-unit.source: Now that we have a ball, we are ready to add a basic animation like we have learned in the last chapter of this tutorial. Again, window.requestAnimationFrame() helps us to control the animation. The ball gets moving by adding a velocity vector to the position. For each frame, we also clear the canvas to remove old circles from prior frames.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们有了一个球，我们准备添加一个基本的动画，就像在本教程的最后一章中学到的那样。同样， window.requestAnimationFrame() 可以帮助我们控制动画。通过将速度矢量添加到该位置来使球移动。对于每一帧，我们还清除画布以删除先前帧中的旧圆圈。

trans-unit.source: Now that we have set up our canvas environment, we can get into the details of how to draw on the canvas. By the end of this article, you will have learned how to draw rectangles, triangles, lines, arcs and curves, providing familiarity with some of the basic shapes. Working with paths is essential when drawing objects onto the canvas and we will see how that can be done.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们已经设置了画布环境，我们可以深入了解如何在画布上绘制。到本文结尾，您将学习如何绘制矩形，三角形，直线，圆弧和曲线，从而熟悉一些基本形状。将对象绘制到画布上时，使用路径至关重要，我们将看到如何做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: Now that we've built a mechanism for exchanging messages, we need a protocol defining how those messages will look. This can be done in a number of ways; what's demonstrated here is just one possible way to structure signaling messages.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们已经建立了一个交换消息的机制,我们需要一个协议来定义这些消息的样子。这可以通过多种方式来实现;这里演示的只是一种可能的信号消息结构方式。

trans-unit.source: Now that we've created a video decoding configuration we can pass it as a paramater of the MediaCapabilities.decodingInfo() method to determine if a video matching this configuration would be decodable and if the playback would be smooth and power efficient.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们已经创建了视频解码配置，我们可以将其作为 MediaCapabilities.decodingInfo() 方法的参数来传递，以确定与该配置匹配的视频是否可解码，以及回放是否流畅且省电。

If compiling or linking fails the code displays an alert.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们已经定义了两个着色器，我们需要将它们传递给WebGL，对其进行编译并将它们链接在一起。下面的代码通过调用 loadShader() 来创建两个着色器，并传递着色器的类型和源。然后，它创建一个程序，附加着色器并将它们链接在一起。如果编译或链接失败，代码将显示警报。

trans-unit.target: 现在,我们已经完成了任务管理和显示维护的代码,我们实际上可以开始设置运行任务的代码,以完成工作。

trans-unit.source: Now that we've started negotiation with the other peer and have transmitted an offer, let's look at what happens on the callee's side of the connection for a while. The callee receives the offer and calls handleVideoOfferMsg() function to process it. Let's see how the callee handles the "video-offer" message.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们已经开始与其他对等方进行协商并发送了要约，让我们看一下连接的被叫方发生了一段时间。被叫方收到要约，并调用 handleVideoOfferMsg() 函数对其进行处理。让我们看看被叫方如何处理 "video-offer" 消息。

trans-unit.source: Now that you are familiar with the basic concepts of the DOM, there is a document explaining the DOM Level 1 fundamental methods. It is the follow-up to this document.
trans-unit.target: 现在您已经熟悉了DOM的基本概念，现在有一个文档介绍了DOM Level 1的基本方法。这是本文档的后续内容。

trans-unit.source: Now that you have a transaction you need to understand its lifetime. Transactions are tied very closely to the event loop. If you make a transaction and return to the event loop without using it then the transaction will become inactive. The only way to keep the transaction active is to make a request on it. When the request is finished you'll get a DOM event and, assuming that the request succeeded, you'll have another opportunity to extend the transaction during that callback. If you return to the event loop without extending the transaction then it will become inactive, and so on. As long as there are pending requests the transaction remains active. Transaction lifetimes are really very simple but it might take a little time to get used to. A few more examples will help, too. If you start seeing TRANSACTION_INACTIVE_ERR error codes then you've messed something up.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您有一个事务，您需要了解其生命周期。事务与事件循环紧密相关。如果进行事务并不使用事件返回事件循环，则事务将变为非活动状态。使事务保持活动状态的唯一方法是对其进行请求。请求完成后，您将获得一个DOM事件，并假设请求成功，您将有另一个机会在该回调期间扩展事务。如果返回事件循环而不扩展事务，则它将变为非活动状态，依此类推。只要有待处理的请求，事务就保持活动状态。事务生存期确实非常简单，但是可能需要一点时间来习惯。其他一些示例也将有所帮助。如果您开始看到 TRANSACTION_INACTIVE_ERR 错误代码，那么您就搞砸了。

trans-unit.target: 现在你已经有了一个事务,你需要从中获取对象存储。事务只让你拥有一个你在创建事务时指定的对象存储。然后你就可以添加你需要的所有数据。

trans-unit.source: Now to structure the database. IndexedDB uses object stores rather than tables, and a single database can contain any number of object stores. Whenever a value is stored in an object store, it is associated with a key. There are several different ways that a key can be supplied depending on whether the object store uses a key path or a key generator.
trans-unit.target: 现在构造数据库。 IndexedDB使用对象存储而不是表，并且单个数据库可以包含任意数量的对象存储。每当值存储在对象存储中时，它就会与键相关联。根据对象存储库是使用密钥路径还是密钥生成器，可以通过几种不同的方式提供密钥。

trans-unit.source: Now we set our barWidth to be equal to the canvas width divided by the number of bars (the buffer length). However, we are also multiplying that width by 2.5, because most of the frequencies will come back as having no audio in them, as most of the sounds we hear every day are in a certain lower frequency range. We don't want to display loads of empty bars, therefore we simply shift the ones that will display regularly at a noticeable height across so they fill the canvas display.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们将 barWidth 设置为等于画布宽度除以条数（缓冲区长度）。但是，我们也将宽度乘以2.5，因为大多数频率会因为没有音频而返回，因为我们每天听到的大多数声音都处于某个较低的频率范围内。我们不想显示空条的负载，因此我们只是简单地将那些会定期以明显的高度显示的空条移动，以便它们填充画布显示。

trans-unit.source: Now you’ve got your reader attached, you can read data chunks out of the stream using the ReadableStreamDefaultReader.read() method. This reads one chunk out of the stream, which you can then do anything you like with. For example, our Simple stream pump example goes on to enqueue each chunk in a new, custom ReadableStream (we will find more about this in the next section), then create a new Response out of it, consume it as a Blob, create an object URL out of that blob using URL.createObjectURL(), and then display it on screen in an <img> element, effectively creating a copy of the image we originally fetched.
trans-unit.target: 现在已经连接了阅读器，您可以使用 ReadableStreamDefaultReader.read() 方法从流中读取数据块。这将从流中读取一个块，然后您可以执行任何您喜欢的操作。例如，我们的简单流泵示例继续将每个块放入新的自定义 ReadableStream 中（我们将在下一节中找到更多信息），然后在其中创建一个新的 Response ，将其用作 Blob ，并创建一个使用 URL.createObjectURL() 从该Blob中提取对象URL ，然后在 <img> 元素中将其显示在屏幕上，从而有效地创建了我们最初获取的图像的副本。

trans-unit.source: Object stores are created with a single call to createObjectStore(). The method takes a name of the store, and a parameter object. Even though the parameter object is optional, it is very important, because it lets you define important optional properties and refine the type of object store you want to create. In our case, we've asked for an object store named "customers" and defined a keyPath, which is the property that makes an individual object in the store unique. That property in this example is "ssn" since a social security number is guaranteed to be unique. "ssn" must be present on every object that is stored in the objectStore.
trans-unit.target: 通过一次调用 createObjectStore() 即可创建对象存储。该方法采用商店名称和参数对象。即使参数对象是可选的，它也非常重要，因为它使您可以定义重要的可选属性并优化要创建的对象存储的类型。在我们的例子中，我们要求一个名为“ customers”的对象存储，并定义了一个 keyPath ，该属性使存储中的单个对象变得唯一。在此示例中，该属性为“ ssn”，因为可以确保社会保险号是唯一的。 “ ssn”必须出现在 objectStore 中存储的每个对象上。

trans-unit.source: Objects in the CanvasRenderingContext2D rendering context have a current transformation matrix and methods to manipulate it. The transformation matrix is applied when creating the current default path, painting text, shapes and Path2D objects. The methods listed below remain for historical and compatibility reasons as SVGMatrix objects are used in most parts of the API nowadays and will be used in the future instead.
trans-unit.target: CanvasRenderingContext2D 渲染上下文中的对象具有当前的转换矩阵和对其进行操作的方法。创建当前默认路径，绘制文本，形状和 Path2D 对象时，将应用转换矩阵。出于历史和兼容性的原因，下面列出的方法仍然存在，因为 SVGMatrix 对象如今在API的大多数部分中都将使用，并且将来会使用。

trans-unit.source: Objects of these types are designed to hold small audio snippets, typically less than 45 s. For longer sounds, objects implementing the MediaElementAudioSourceNode are more suitable. The buffer contains data in the following format: non-interleaved IEEE754 32-bit linear PCM with a nominal range between -1 and +1, that is, 32bits floating point buffer, with each samples between -1.0 and 1.0. If the AudioBuffer has multiple channels, they are stored in separate buffer.
trans-unit.target: 这些类型的对象旨在容纳通常少于45 s的较小音频片段。对于更长的声音，实现 MediaElementAudioSourceNode 的对象更合适。该缓冲区包含以下格式的数据：标称范围在 -1 和 +1 之间的非交织IEEE754 32位线性PCM ，即32位浮点缓冲区，每个样本在-1.0和1.0之间。如果 AudioBuffer 具有多个通道，则将它们存储在单独的缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: Obtaining crisp lines requires understanding how paths are stroked. In the images below, the grid represents the canvas coordinate grid. The squares between gridlines are actual on-screen pixels. In the first grid image below, a rectangle from (2,1) to (5,5) is filled. The entire area between them (light red) falls on pixel boundaries, so the resulting filled rectangle will have crisp edges.
trans-unit.target: 要获得清晰的线条,需要了解路径的描画方式。在下面的图片中,网格代表画布坐标网格。网格线之间的方块是屏幕上的实际像素。在下面的第一张网格图像中,从(2,1)到(5,5)的矩形被填充。它们之间的整个区域(浅红色)落在像素边界上,所以填充后的矩形会有清晰的边缘。

trans-unit.source: Obviously, browsers do not want to allow some advertising network or malicious website to pollute your computer, so browsers used to prompt the user the first time any given web app attempts to open an IndexedDB for storage. The user could choose to allow or deny access. Also, IndexedDB storage in browsers' privacy modes only lasts in-memory until the incognito session is closed (Private Browsing mode for Firefox and Incognito mode for Chrome, but in Firefox this is not implemented yet as of Nov 2015 so you can't use IndexedDB in Firefox Private Browsing at all).
trans-unit.target: 显然，浏览器不希望允许某些广告网络或恶意网站污染您的计算机，因此浏览器用于在任何给定的Web应用程序首次尝试打开IndexedDB进行存储时提示用户。用户可以选择允许或拒绝访问。另外，浏览器的隐私模式下的IndexedDB存储只会在内存中持续到隐身会话关闭为止（Firefox的私有浏览模式和Chrome的隐身模式，但是在Firefox中，截至2015年11月尚未实现，因此您不能使用Firefox私有浏览中的IndexedDB）。

trans-unit.source: Obviously, this is a simple example, implementing basic per-vertex lighting. For more advanced graphics, you'll want to implement per-pixel lighting, but this will get you headed in the right direction.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if a request is made on a source database that doesn't exist (e.g. has been deleted or removed.) In Firefox previous to version 41, an InvalidStateError was raised in this case as well, which was misleading; this has now been fixed (see bug 1176165.)

trans-unit.source: Of course, you wouldn't use someone's social security number as the primary key to a customer table because not everyone has a social security number, and you would store their birth date instead of their age, but let's ignore those unfortunate choices for the sake of convenience and move along.
trans-unit.target: 当然,你不会使用某人的社会安全号作为客户表的主键,因为不是每个人都有社会安全号,你会存储他们的出生日期而不是他们的年龄,但为了方便起见,让我们忽略这些不幸的选择,继续前进。

trans-unit.source: Of equal importance are the rules around notification. Browsers are required to display an indicator that shows that a camera or microphone is in use, above and beyond any hardware indicator that may exist. They must also show an indicator that permission has been granted to use a device for input, even if the device is not actively recording at the moment.
trans-unit.target: 同样重要的是关于通知的规则。浏览器必须显示一个指示器,表明正在使用摄像头或麦克风,而不是任何可能存在的硬件指示器。浏览器还必须显示一个指示器,表明已获准使用设备进行输入,即使该设备目前没有积极录制。

trans-unit.source: On Firefox, the general.platform.override preference can be used to override the value that would otherwise be returned by this property.

trans-unit.source: On Firefox, the event handler property corresponding to the change event is ontypechange.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox上，与 change 事件对应的事件处理程序属性为 ontypechange 。

trans-unit.source: On IE 6-8 the event model is different. Event listeners are attached with the non-standard EventTarget.attachEvent method. In this model, the event object has a Event.srcElement property, instead of the target property, and it has the same semantics as event.target.
trans-unit.target: 在IE 6-8上，事件模型有所不同。事件侦听器附带有非标准的 EventTarget.attachEvent 方法。在此模型中，事件对象具有 Event.srcElement 属性（而不是 target 属性），并且具有与 event.target 相同的语义。

trans-unit.source: On IE, this property returns undefined.
trans-unit.target: 在IE上,该属性返回未定义。

trans-unit.source: On Internet Explorer 6 through 8, the event model is different. Event listeners are attached with the non-standard EventTarget.attachEvent method. In this model, there is no equivalent to event.currentTarget and this is the global object. One solution to emulate the event.currentTarget feature is to wrap your handler in a function calling the handler using Function.prototype.call with the element as a first argument. This way, this will be the expected value.
trans-unit.target: 在Internet Explorer 6到8中，事件模型是不同的。事件侦听器附带有非标准的 EventTarget.attachEvent 方法。在此模型中，没有等效于 event.currentTarget 的对象， this 是全局对象。模拟 event.currentTarget 功能的一种解决方案是将处理程序包装在使用 Function.prototype.call 并将处理程序作为第一个参数的调用处理程序的函数中。这样， this 将是期望值。

trans-unit.source: On Linux (GTK), the 4th button and the 5th button are not supported. In addition, a mouseup event always has the releasing button information in this attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 在Linux(GTK)上,不支持第四个按钮和第五个按钮。此外,一个鼠标移动事件总是在这个属性值中包含释放按钮的信息。

trans-unit.source: On Linux, Firefox 12 and earlier also dispatched the keypress event for these keys.
trans-unit.target: 在Linux上，Firefox 12和更早版本也为这些键调度了 keypress 事件。

trans-unit.source: On Mac OS X 10.5, the buttons attribute always returns 0 because there is no platform API for implementing this feature.

trans-unit.source: On Mac OS X, it's hard to get scancode or something which can distinguish a physical key from a key event. Therefore, Gecko always maps code value from the virtual keycode.

See Pending and current descriptions in WebRTC connectivity for details on this algorithm and why it's used.
trans-unit.target: 从更基本的 RTCPeerConnection.pendingLocalDescription 如果该属性不为 null ，则返回的值为RTCPeerConnection.pendingLocalDescription的值。否则，返回 RTCPeerConnection.currentLocalDescription 的值。见挂起和当前的描述中的WebRTC连接的详细信息，这种算法以及为什么它的使用。

trans-unit.source: On a more fundamental level, the returned value is the value of RTCPeerConnection.pendingRemoteDescription if that property isn't null; otherwise, the value of RTCPeerConnection.currentRemoteDescription is returned. See Pending and current descriptions in WebRTC connectivity for details on this algorithm and why it's used.
trans-unit.target: 从更基本的 RTCPeerConnection.pendingRemoteDescription 如果该属性不为 null ，则返回的值为RTCPeerConnection.pendingRemoteDescription的值。否则，返回 RTCPeerConnection.currentRemoteDescription 的值。见挂起和当前的描述中的WebRTC连接的详细信息，这种算法以及为什么它的使用。

trans-unit.source: On an outermost <svg> element, this float attribute indicates the current scale factor relative to the initial view to take into account user magnification and panning operations. DOM attributes currentScale and currentTranslate are equivalent to the 2x3 matrix [a b c d e f] = [currentScale 0 0 currentScale currentTranslate.x currentTranslate.y]. If "magnification" is enabled (i.e., zoomAndPan="magnify"), then the effect is as if an extra transformation were placed at the outermost level on the SVG document fragment (i.e., outside the outermost <svg> element).
trans-unit.target: 在最外面的 <svg> 元素上，此float属性指示相对于初始视图的当前比例因子，以考虑用户放大和平移操作。 DOM属性 currentScale 和 currentTranslate 等效于2x3矩阵 [a b c d e f] = [currentScale 0 0 currentScale currentTranslate.x currentTranslate.y] 。如果启用了“放大”功能（即 zoomAndPan="magnify" ），则效果就像在SVG文档片段的最外层（即，最外层 <svg> 元素之外）上进行了额外的转换。

trans-unit.source: On return, charging indicates whether or not the battery, which is a BatteryManager object, is currently being charged; if the battery is charging, this value is true. Otherwise, the value is false.

trans-unit.source: On return, currentStyleSheetSet indicates the name of the style sheet set currently in use. You can also set the current style sheet set using this property.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， currentStyleSheetSet 指示当前正在使用的样式表集的名称。您也可以使用此属性设置当前样式表集。

trans-unit.source: On return, exampleSocket.readyState is CONNECTING. The readyState will become OPEN once the connection is ready to transfer data.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， exampleSocket.readyState 为 CONNECTING 。一旦连接准备好传输数据， readyState 将变为 OPEN 。

trans-unit.source: On return, intViewportHeight is the height of the browser window's viewport.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， intViewportHeight 是浏览器窗口的视口的高度。

trans-unit.source: On return, lastStyleSheetSet indicates the style sheet set that was most recently set. If the current style sheet set has not been changed by setting document.selectedStyleSheetSet, the returned value is null.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， lastStyleSheetSet 指示最近设置的样式表集。如果尚未通过设置 document.selectedStyleSheetSet 更改当前样式表集，则返回值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: On return, level is a number representing the system's battery charge level scaled to a value between 0.0 and 1.0. A value of 0 means the battery, which is a BatteryManager object, is empty and the system is about to be suspended. A value of 1.0 means the battery is full. A value of 1.0 is also returned if the implementation isn't able to determine the battery charge level or if the system is not battery-powered.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， level 是一个数字，代表系统的电池充电水平，将其缩放到0.0到1.0之间的值。0表示A值 battery ，这是一个 BatteryManager 对象，是空的，该系统是将被暂停。值1.0表示电池已充满。如果实现无法确定电池电量或系统不是由电池供电，则还将返回1.0值。

trans-unit.source: On return, outWindowHeight contains the height of the outside of the window.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， outWindowHeight 包含窗口外部的高度。

trans-unit.source: On return, outWindowWidth is the width of the outside of the window.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， outWindowWidth 是窗口外部的宽度。

trans-unit.source: On return, preferredStyleSheetSet indicates the author's preferred style sheet set. This is determined from the order of style sheet declarations and the Default-Style HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， preferredStyleSheetSet 指示作者的首选样式表集。这是由样式表声明和 Default-Style HTTP标头的顺序确定的。

trans-unit.source: On return, sets is a list of style sheet sets that are available.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， sets 是可用的样式表集合的列表。

trans-unit.source: On return, time is the remaining time in seconds until the battery, which is a BatteryManager object, is fully charged, or 0 if the battery is already fully charged. If the battery is currently discharging, this value is Infinity.
trans-unit.target: 在返回时， time 是以秒为单位的剩余时间，直到 battery ，这是一个 BatteryManager 对象，被完全充电，或0，如果电池已经被充满电。如果电池当前正在放电，则此值为 Infinity 。

trans-unit.source: On return, time is the remaining time in seconds until the battery, which is a BatteryManager object, is fully discharged and the system will suspend. This value is Infinity if the battery is currently charging rather than discharging, or if the system is unable to report the remaining discharging time.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， time 是直到 battery （即 BatteryManager 对象）完全放电并且系统将挂起之前的剩余时间（以秒为单位）。如果电池当前正在充电而不是放电，或者系统无法报告剩余的放电时间，则此值为 Infinity 。

trans-unit.source: On return, absolute is true if the orientation data in instanceOfDeviceOrientationEvent is provided as the difference between the Earth's coordinate frame and the device's coordinate frame, or false if the orientation data is being provided in reference to some arbitrary, device-determined coordinate frame.
trans-unit.target: 返回时，如果将 instanceOfDeviceOrientationEvent 中的方向数据作为地球坐标系和设备坐标系之间的差值提供，则 true 为 absolute ；如果参考某些任意的设备确定的坐标系提供方向数据，则为 false 。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if the tone buffer is empty, our example is designed to disconnect the call. This is done by stopping each stream on both the caller and the receiver by iterating over each RTCPeerConnection's track list (as returned by its getTracks() method) and calling each track's stop() method.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，如果音频缓冲区为空，则我们的示例旨在断开呼叫。通过在每个 RTCPeerConnection 的轨道列表（由其 getTracks() 方法返回）上进行迭代并调用每个轨道的 stop() 方法，可以在调用方和接收方上停止每个流，从而完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if you're trying to emulate WebKit's behavior on Gecko, you need to place the element you want to present inside another element, which you'll make fullscreen instead, and use CSS rules to adjust the inner element to match the appearance you want.

trans-unit.source: On the right we see a stop button and the <video> element which will be used to play back the recorded video. Notice that the playback panel doesn't have autoplay set (so the playback doesn't start as soon as media arrives), and it has controls set, which tells it to show the user controls to play, pause, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 在右侧，我们看到一个停止按钮和 <video> 元素，它们将用于播放录制的视频。请注意，没有设置播放面板的自动播放功能（因此，一旦媒体到达播放就不会立即开始播放），并且设置了 controls ，它告诉它显示用户控件的播放，暂停等。

trans-unit.source: On the same line, we then have a string of -->
trans-unit.target: 在同一行上，然后有一个字符串 -->

trans-unit.source: On the software side, Valve has created SteamVR software, which is compatible with the VIVE and other solutions, and serves to provide access to software, such as a usable VR UI.
trans-unit.target: 在软件方面，Valve已创建了SteamVR软件，该软件与VIVE和其他解决方案兼容，并用于提供对软件（例如可用的VR UI）的访问。

trans-unit.source: On to the end of the function call, we chain the promise then() method, which contains two functions — the first one is executed when the promise successfully resolves, and the second is called when the promise is rejected. In the resolved case, we display the image inside myImage and append it to the body (it’s argument is the request.response contained inside the promise’s resolve method); in the rejected case we return an error to the console.
trans-unit.target: 在函数调用的最后，我们链接了promise then() 方法，该方法包含两个函数-第一个函数在promise成功解析后执行，第二个函数在promise被拒绝时调用。在已解决的情况下，我们将图像显示在 myImage 内并将其附加到主体（它的参数是promise的 resolve 方法中包含的 request.response ）；在被拒绝的情况下，我们将错误返回到控制台。

trans-unit.source: Once getData() has finished running, we start the audio source playing with start(0), then disable the play button so it can't be clicked again when it is already playing (this would cause an error.)
trans-unit.target: 一旦 getData() 完成运行，我们将使用 start(0) 启动音频源的播放，然后禁用播放按钮，这样在播放时就无法再次单击它（这会导致错误。）

trans-unit.source: Once getUserMedia has created a media stream successfully, you create a new Media Recorder instance with the MediaRecorder() constructor and pass it the stream directly. This is your entry point into using the MediaRecorder API — the stream is now ready to be captured into a Blob, in the default encoding format of your browser.
trans-unit.target: 一旦 getUserMedia 成功创建了媒体流，就可以使用 MediaRecorder() 构造函数创建一个新的Media Recorder实例，并将其直接传递给该流。这是使用MediaRecorder API的切入点-现在可以使用浏览器的默认编码格式将流捕获到 Blob 中。

trans-unit.source: Once options is ready, we create the new observer, calling the IntersectionObserver() constructor, specifying a function to be called when intersection crosses one of our thresholds, handleIntersect(), and our set of options. We then call observe() on the returned observer, passing into it the desired target element.
trans-unit.target: 一旦 options 准备好了，我们创建了新的观察员，调用 IntersectionObserver() 构造函数，指定一个函数被调用时，路口穿越我们的其中一个阈值， handleIntersect() ，和我们的设置选项。然后，我们在返回的观察者上调用 observe() ，将所需的目标元素传递给它。

trans-unit.source: Once setLocalDescription()'s fulfillment handler has run, the ICE agent begins sending icecandidate events to the RTCPeerConnection, one for each potential configuration it discovers. Our handler for the icecandidate event is responsible for transmitting the candidates to the other peer.
trans-unit.target: 一旦 setLocalDescription() 的实现处理程序运行，ICE代理便开始将 icecandidate 事件发送到 RTCPeerConnection ，它针对发现的每个潜在配置发送一个事件。我们针对 icecandidate 事件的处理程序负责将候选人发送给其他同龄人。

trans-unit.source: Once a Response is retrieved, there are a number of methods available to define what the body content is and how it should be handled (see Body).
trans-unit.target: 检索到 Response ，可以使用多种方法来定义主体内容以及应如何处理它（请参见 Body ）。

trans-unit.source: Once a Range is created, you need to set its boundary points before you can make use of most of its methods.
trans-unit.target: 一旦 Range 被创建，你需要设置它的边界点之前，你可以利用它的大多数方法。

trans-unit.source: Once a WebGL extension is enabled, you are able to use the methods, properties or constants that this extension object provides.
trans-unit.target: 启用WebGL扩展后,您就可以使用该扩展对象提供的方法、属性或常量。

trans-unit.source: Once a timer's code has finished running, the duration of time it took to execute is subtracted from its window's timeout budget.
trans-unit.target: 一旦定时器的代码运行完毕,它的执行时间就会从其窗口的超时预算中减去。

trans-unit.source: Once all of the shaders are compiled, the program is linked using gl.linkProgram().
trans-unit.target: 编译完所有着色器后，将使用 gl.linkProgram() 链接程序。

trans-unit.source: Once all of the transactions have completed, the database connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 一旦所有事务完成,数据库连接就会关闭。

trans-unit.source: Once all the gain nodes are created, we create the ConstantSourceNode, constantNode. We connect its output to the gainAudioParam on both gainNode2 and gainNode3, and we start the constant node running by calling its start() method; now it's sending the value 0.5 to the two gain nodes' values, and any change to constantNode.offset will automatically set the gain of both gainNode2 and gainNode3 (affecting their audio inputs as expected).
trans-unit.target: 创建所有增益节点后，我们将创建 ConstantSourceNode ， constantNode 。我们连接其输出到 gain AudioParam 两个 gainNode2 和 gainNode3 ，我们开始不断的节点通过调用其运行 start() 方法;现在它将值0.5发送到两个增益节点的值，对 constantNode.offset 的任何更改将自动设置 gainNode2 和 gainNode3 的增益（如预期那样影响它们的音频输入）。

trans-unit.source: Once all three oscillators have been created, they're started by calling each one's ConstantSourceNode.start() method in turn, and playing is set to true to track that the tones are playing.
trans-unit.target: 一旦创建了所有三个振荡器，就可以通过依次调用每个人的 ConstantSourceNode.start() 方法来启动它们，并将 playing 设置为 true 以跟踪音调正在播放。

trans-unit.source: Once applied, the number of samples is reduced to its initial numbers. This leads to better results by avoiding some aliasing, but comes at the expense of a lower precision shaping curve.
trans-unit.target: 一旦应用,采样数就会减少到其初始数。这样可以避免一些混叠,从而得到更好的结果,但代价是降低了整形曲线的精度。

trans-unit.source: Once both the caller's and the receiver's media tracks are all stopped, we pause the <audio> element and set its srcObject to null. This detaches the audio stream from the <audio> element.
trans-unit.target: 一旦呼叫者和接收者的媒体轨道都停止，我们将暂停 <audio> 元素并将其 srcObject 设置为 null 。这会将音频流与 <audio> 元素分离。

trans-unit.source: Once captured, the event object gives access to different kinds of information:
trans-unit.target: 一旦被捕获,事件对象就可以访问不同种类的信息。

trans-unit.source: Once captured, the event object gives access to the light intensity expressed in lux through the DeviceLightEvent.value property.
trans-unit.target: 一旦捕获，事件对象就可以通过 DeviceLightEvent.value 属性访问以勒克斯表示的光强度。

trans-unit.source: Once media has been selected and loading is ready to begin, the loadstart event is delivered.
trans-unit.target: 一旦选择了介质并且可以开始加载， loadstart 事件。

trans-unit.source: Once mouse capture is released, mouse events will no longer all be directed to the element on which capture is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 一旦鼠标捕捉被释放,鼠标事件将不再全部指向启用捕捉的元素。

trans-unit.source: Once per pass through the browser's event loop, each IntersectionObserver checks to see if any of its target elements have passed through any of the observer's intersection ratio thresholds. For each observer, a list of targets that have done so is compiled, and sent to the observer's callback as an array of IntersectionObserverEntry objects. Our callback, intersectionCallback(), looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 每次通过浏览器的事件循环一次后，每个 IntersectionObserver 都会检查其目标元素是否已通过观察者的相交比率阈值。对于每个观察者，将编译已执行此操作的目标列表，并将其作为 IntersectionObserverEntry 对象的数组发送到观察者的回调中。我们的回调函数 intersectionCallback() 如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Once successfully registered, a service worker can and will be terminated when idle to conserve memory and processor power. An active service worker is automatically restarted to respond to events, such as ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onfetch or ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onmessage.
trans-unit.target: 成功注册后，服务工作者可以并且将在空闲时被终止，以节省内存和处理器电量。活动的服务程序会自动重新启动以响应事件，例如 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onfetch 或 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onmessage 。

trans-unit.source: Once that succeeds, the answer is sent to the signaling server using whatever protocol you see fit.
trans-unit.target: 一旦成功,答案就会使用你认为合适的任何协议发送到信令服务器。

trans-unit.source: Once that's done, applyConstraints() is called on the audio track (if there is one) to apply the new audio constraints. If this succeeds, the contents of the audio track's current settings box are updated based on the result of calling its getSettings() method.
trans-unit.target: 完成后，在音轨上调用 applyConstraints() （如果有的话）以应用新的音频约束。如果成功，则基于调用其 getSettings() 方法的结果来更新音轨当前设置框的内容。

trans-unit.source: Once that's done, insertAdjacentHTML() is used to insert the <input> element into the DOM.
trans-unit.target: 完成之后，使用 insertAdjacentHTML() 将 <input> 元素插入DOM。

trans-unit.source: Once that's done, we create a JavaScript array containing the position for each vertex of the square plane. This is then converted into an array of floats and passed into the gl object's bufferData() method to establish the vertex positions for the object.
trans-unit.target: 完成后，我们将创建一个JavaScript数组，其中包含正方形平面每个顶点的位置。然后将其转换为浮点数组，并传递至 gl 对象的 bufferData() 方法中，以建立对象的顶点位置。

trans-unit.source: Once the NodeList of matching elements is returned, you can examine it just like any array. If the array is empty (that is, its length property is 0), then no matches were found.
trans-unit.target: 返回匹配元素的 NodeList 后，您可以像检查任何数组一样对其进行检查。如果数组为空（即其 length 属性为0），则找不到匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Once the RTCPeerConnection is open, the datachannel event is sent to the remote to complete the process of opening the data channel; this invokes our receiveChannelCallback() method, which looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 一旦 RTCPeerConnection 是开放的， datachannel 事件被发送到远程完成打开所述数据信道的处理; 这将调用我们的 receiveChannelCallback() 方法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Once the PaymentRequest object has been created, you call the PaymentRequest.show() method on it to initiate the payment request. This returns a promise that fulfills with a PaymentResponse object if the payment is successful:
trans-unit.target: 一旦 PaymentRequest 对象被创建时，可以调用 PaymentRequest.show() 方法就可以发起支付请求。如果付款成功，这将返回一个使用 PaymentResponse 对象满足的承诺：

trans-unit.source: Once the RTCPeerConnection has been created, we request access to the user's camera and microphone by calling MediaDevices.getUserMedia(), which is exposed to us through the Navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia property. When this succeeds, fulfilling the returned promise, our then handler is executed. It receives, as input, a MediaStream object representing the stream with audio from the user's microphone and video from their webcam.
trans-unit.target: 一旦 RTCPeerConnection 已经建立，我们通过调用请求访问用户的摄像头和麦克风 MediaDevices.getUserMedia() ，它是通过暴露给我们 Navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia 财产。成功完成后，将履行返回的Promise， then 执行我们的then处理程序。它接收作为输入的 MediaStream 对象作为输入，其中包含来自用户麦克风的音频和来自其网络摄像头的视频。

trans-unit.source: Once the HTML for the report is generated, it is injected into the element whose class is "stats-box" by setting its innerHTML property.
trans-unit.target: 生成报告的HTML后，可以通过设置它的 innerHTML 属性将其注入到类为 "stats-box" 的元素中。

trans-unit.source: Once the ICE session is complete, the configuration that's currently in effect is the final one, unless an ICE reset occurs.
trans-unit.target: 一旦ICE会话完成,当前有效的配置就是最终配置,除非发生ICE重置。

trans-unit.source: Once the amount of directional lighting is computed, we can generate the lighting value by taking the ambient light and adding in the product of the directional light's color and the amount of directional lighting to provide. As a result, we now have an RGB value that will be used by the fragment shader to adjust the color of each pixel we render.
trans-unit.target: 一旦计算出定向照明的数量,我们就可以通过取环境光并加入定向光的颜色和要提供的定向照明数量的乘积来生成照明值。结果,我们现在有了一个RGB值,它将被片段着色器用来调整我们渲染的每个像素的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Once the answer has been created using myPeerConnection.createAnswer(), the description of the local end of the connection is set to the answer's SDP by calling myPeerConnection.setLocalDescription(), then the answer is transmitted through the signaling server to the caller to let them know what the answer is
trans-unit.target: 一旦使用 myPeerConnection.createAnswer() 创建了答案，就可以通过调用 myPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() 将连接本地端的描述设置为答案的SDP ，然后将答案通过信令服务器传输给调用方，以使他们知道答案是什么

trans-unit.source: Once the answer has been created, it's passed into the remoteConnection by calling RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription(). That establishes the remote's end of the connection (which, to the remote peer, is its local end. This stuff can be confusing, but you get used to it.
trans-unit.target: 创建答案后，将通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() 将其传递到remoteConnection中。这样就建立了远程的连接端（到远程对等方是本地端。这种东西可能会令人困惑，但是您已经习惯了。）

trans-unit.source: Once the caller has created its RTCPeerConnection, created a media stream, and added its tracks to the connection as shown in Starting a call, the browser will deliver a negotiationneeded event to the RTCPeerConnection to indicate that it's ready to begin negotiation with the other peer. Here's our code for handling the negotiationneeded event:
trans-unit.target: 调用者创建其 RTCPeerConnection ，创建媒体流并将其轨道添加到连接后，如开始呼叫中所示，浏览器将向 RTCPeerConnection 传递一个需要 negotiationneeded 事件，以表明它已准备好开始与另一个对等方进行协商。这是用于处理 negotiationneeded 事件的代码：

trans-unit.source: Once the canvas contains the captured image, we convert it to PNG format by calling HTMLCanvasElement.toDataURL() on it; finally, we call photo.setAttribute() to make our captured still box display the image.
trans-unit.target: 画布包含捕获的图像后，我们可以通过在其上调用 HTMLCanvasElement.toDataURL() 将其转换为PNG格式。最后，我们调用 photo.setAttribute() 以使捕获的静止图像框显示图像。

trans-unit.source: Once the configuration object has been created, it is passed into the RTCPeerConnection() constructor to use it as the configuration for the new peer connection.
trans-unit.target: 创建配置对象后，会将其传递到 RTCPeerConnection() 构造函数中，以将其用作新对等连接的配置。

trans-unit.source: Once the connection is established (that is, readyState is OPEN), exampleSocket.protocol will tell you which protocol the server selected.
trans-unit.target: 建立连接后（即 readyState 为 OPEN ）， exampleSocket.protocol 将告诉您服务器选择了哪种协议。

trans-unit.source: Once the connection is opened, incoming messages from the server are delivered to your code in the form of message events.
trans-unit.target: 打开连接后，来自服务器的传入消息将以 message 事件的形式传递到您的代码中。

trans-unit.source: Once the current item is in the list, the item's isDirectory property is checked. If the item is a directory, we need to recurse into that directory. The first step is to create a FileSystemDirectoryReader to handle fetching the directory's contents. That's done by calling the item's createReader() method. Then a new <ul> is created and appended to the parent list; this will contain the directory's contents in the next level down in the list's hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 一旦当前项目在列表中，就检查该项目的 isDirectory 属性。如果项目是目录，则需要递归到该目录。第一步是创建一个 FileSystemDirectoryReader 来处理获取目录的内容。这是通过调用项目的 createReader() 方法来完成的。然后，创建一个新的 <ul> 并将其附加到父列表中。这将在列表层次结构的下一级包含目录的内容。

trans-unit.source: Once the drag is complete, a dragend event is fired at the source of the drag (the same element that received the dragstart event). This event will fire if the drag was successful[1] or if it was cancelled. However, you can use the dropEffect property to determine what drop operation occurred.
trans-unit.target: 拖动完成后，将在拖动源（接收到 dragstart 事件的同一元素）处触发 dragend 事件。如果拖动成功[1]或取消，则会触发此事件。但是，可以使用 dropEffect 属性确定发生了什么放置操作。

trans-unit.source: Once the keyboard has been constructed, we scroll the note "B" in octave 5 into view; this has the effect of ensuring that middle-C is visible along with its surrounding keys.
trans-unit.target: 一旦键盘构建完成,我们将八度5的音符 "B "滚动到视图中;这样做的效果是确保中间的C和它周围的键都能看到。

trans-unit.source: Once the new cue is created, it needs to be added to a TextTrack. Once added, this cue will be drawn from seconds 2 to 3 and will show the text Cool text to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 创建新提示后，需要将其添加到 TextTrack 中。添加后，此提示将从2秒到3秒绘制，并显示要显示的文字 Cool text to be displayed 。

trans-unit.source: Once the node has been created, you can't change its coefficients.
trans-unit.target: 一旦节点被创建,你就不能改变它的系数。

trans-unit.source: Once the path has been created, you can stroke or fill the path to render it.
trans-unit.target: 一旦创建了路径,你就可以对路径进行描边或填充来渲染它。

trans-unit.source: Once the payment flow has been triggered using PaymentRequest.show() and the promise resolves successfully, the PaymentResponse object available inside the fulfilled promise (instrumentResponse above) will have a PaymentResponse.details property that will contain response details. This has to conform to the structure defined by the BasicCardResponse dictionary, and may look something like this:
trans-unit.target: 一旦使用 PaymentRequest.show() 触发了付款流程并且成功解决了承诺， PaymentResponse 兑现承诺中可用的PaymentResponse对象（上面的 instrumentResponse ）将具有 PaymentResponse.details 属性，该属性将包含响应详细信息。这必须符合 BasicCardResponse 词典定义的结构，并且可能看起来像这样：

trans-unit.source: Once the payment flow has been triggered using PaymentRequest.show() and the promise resolves successfully, the PaymentResponse object available inside the fulfilled promise (instrumentResponse above) will have a PaymentResponse.details property that will contain response details. This has to conform to the structure defined by the BasicCardResponse dictionary, and may look something like this:
trans-unit.target: 一旦使用 PaymentRequest.show() 触发了付款流程并且成功解决了承诺， PaymentResponse 兑现承诺中可用的PaymentResponse对象（上面的 instrumentResponse ）将具有 PaymentResponse.details 属性，该属性将包含响应详细信息。这必须符合 BasicCardResponse 词典定义的结构，并且可能看起来像这样：

trans-unit.source: Once the payment flow has been triggered using PaymentRequest.show() and the promise resolves successfully, the PaymentResponse object available inside the fulfilled promise (instrumentResponse above) will have a PaymentResponse.details property that will contain response details. This has to conform to the structure defined by the BasicCardResponse dictionary, and may look something like this:
trans-unit.target: 一旦使用 PaymentRequest.show() 触发了付款流程并且成功解决了承诺， PaymentResponse 兑现承诺中可用的PaymentResponse对象（上面的 instrumentResponse ）将具有 PaymentResponse.details 属性，该属性将包含响应详细信息。这必须符合 BasicCardResponse 词典定义的结构，并且可能看起来像这样：

trans-unit.source: Once the position of the vertex is computed, and we pass the coordinates of the texel corresponding to the vertex to the fragment shader, we can work on computing the shading for the vertex.
trans-unit.target: 一旦计算出顶点的位置,我们将顶点对应的texel的坐标传给碎片着色器,我们就可以着手计算顶点的着色了。

trans-unit.source: Once the presentation starts, you'll be able to see the stereoscopic view displayed in the browser:
trans-unit.target: 演示开始后,你就能看到浏览器中显示的立体视图。

trans-unit.source: Once the script knows whether the property or properties it wishes to use are supported, it can then check the capabilities of the API and its implementation by examining the object returned by the track's getCapabilities() method; this object lists each supported constraint and the values or range of values which are supported.
trans-unit.target: 一旦脚本知道是否支持它希望使用的一个或多个属性，就可以通过检查轨道的 getCapabilities() 方法返回的对象来检查API 的功能及其实现。该对象列出了每个受支持的约束以及受支持的值或值范围。

trans-unit.source: Once the shader has the source code, it's compiled using gl.compileShader().
trans-unit.target: 着色器获得源代码后，将使用 gl.compileShader() 对其进行编译。

trans-unit.source: Once the shader program is built, we compute the aspect ratio of our context by dividing its width by its height. Then we set the current rotation vector for the animation to [0, 1], and the scaling vector to [1.0, aspectRatio]. The scaling vector, as we saw in the vertex shader, is used to scale the coordinates to fit the -1.0 to 1.0 range.
trans-unit.target: 生成着色器程序后，我们通过将上下文的宽度除以其高度来计算上下文的纵横比。然后，将动画的当前旋转向量设置为 [0, 1] ，并将缩放向量设置为 [1.0, aspectRatio] 。正如我们在顶点着色器中看到的那样，缩放向量用于缩放坐标以适合-1.0到1.0范围。

trans-unit.source: Once the shaders are established, the locations are looked up, and the square plane's vertex positions put in a buffer, we can actually render the scene. Since we're not animating anything in this example, our drawScene() function is very simple. It uses a few utility routines we'll cover shortly.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立了着色器，便查找了位置，并将正方形平面的顶点位置放入了缓冲区中，我们便可以实际渲染场景了。由于在此示例中我们没有设置任何动画，因此 drawScene() 函数非常简单。它使用了一些实用程序例程，我们将在稍后介绍。

trans-unit.source: Once the source media is playing and you've reached the point where you're ready to record video, call MediaRecorder.start() to begin recording.
trans-unit.target: 播放源媒体后，您就可以开始录制视频了，请调用 MediaRecorder.start() 开始录制。

trans-unit.source: Once the speech recognition is started, there are many event handlers that can be used to retrieve results, and other pieces of surrounding information (see the SpeechRecognition event handlers list.) The most common one you'll probably use is SpeechRecognition.onresult, which is fired once a successful result is received:
trans-unit.target: 一旦开始语音识别，就会有许多事件处理程序可用于检索结果以及其他周围的信息（请参见 SpeechRecognition 事件处理程序列表。）您可能会使用的最常见的是 SpeechRecognition.onresult ，收到成功结果后会被触发：

trans-unit.source: Once the track is selected, you can obtain from its RTCRtpSender the RTCDTMFSender object you'll use for sending DTMF. From there, you can simply call RTCDTMFSender.insertDTMF() to enqueue DTMF signals to be sent on the track to the other peer. The RTCRtpSender will then send the tones to the other peer as packets alongside the track's audio data.
trans-unit.target: 一旦选择了轨道，就可以从其 RTCRtpSender 获取 RTCDTMFSender 对象，该对象将用于发送DTMF。从那里，您可以简单地调用 RTCDTMFSender.insertDTMF() 使DTMF信号排队，以便在轨道上发送给其他对等方。然后， RTCRtpSender 将音调作为数据包与轨道的音频数据一起发送给另一个对等方。

trans-unit.source: Once the two peers agree upon a mutually-compatible candidate, that candidate's SDP is used by each peer to construct and open a connection, through which media then begins to flow. If they later agree on a better (usually higher-performance) candidate, the stream may change formats as needed.
trans-unit.target: 一旦两个对等体商定了一个相互兼容的候选者,每个对等体就会使用该候选者的SDP来构建和打开一个连接,然后媒体就开始通过该连接流动。如果他们后来同意一个更好的(通常是性能更高的)候选者,流可以根据需要改变格式。

trans-unit.source: Once the vertex array has been created, we create a new GL buffer to contain them by calling gl.createBuffer(). We bind the standard WebGL array buffer reference to that by calling gl.bindBuffer() and then copy the vertex data into the buffer using gl.bufferData(). The usage hint gl.STATIC_DRAW is specified, telling WebGL that the data will be set only one time and never modified, but will be used repeatedly. This lets WebGL consider any optimizations it can apply that may improve performance based on that information.
trans-unit.target: 创建顶点数组后，我们将通过调用 gl.createBuffer() 创建一个新的GL缓冲区以包含它们。我们通过调用 gl.bindBuffer() 将标准WebGL数组缓冲区引用绑定到该缓冲区引用，然后使用 gl.bufferData() 将顶点数据复制到缓冲区中。指定了用法提示 gl.STATIC_DRAW ，它告诉WebGL数据将仅设置一次，并且从不修改，但将重复使用。这使WebGL可以基于该信息考虑可以应用的，可以提高性能的任何优化。

trans-unit.source: Once you've established a WebRTC peer connection using the RTCPeerConnection interface, you're able to send and receive media data between the two peers on the connection. But there's a lot more you can do with WebRTC. In this guide, we'll examine how to add a data channel to a peer connection, which can then be used to securely exchange arbitrary data; that is, any kind of data we wish, in any format we choose.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RTCPeerConnection 接口建立WebRTC对等连接后，就可以在该连接上的两个对等之间发送和接收媒体数据。但是，使用WebRTC还可以做更多的事情。在本指南中，我们将研究如何向对等连接添加数据通道，然后可以使用该通道安全地交换任意数据。也就是说，我们希望以任何格式选择的任何类型的数据。

trans-unit.source: One of the most common cases for orientation changes is when you want to revise the layout of your content based on the orientation of the device. For example, perhaps you want a button bar to stretch along the longest dimension of the device's display. By using a media query, you can do this easily and automatically.
trans-unit.target: 方向变化最常见的情况之一是当你想根据设备的方向修改内容的布局。例如,也许你想让按钮栏沿着设备显示的最长尺寸延伸。通过使用媒体查询,您可以轻松自动地实现这一点。

trans-unit.source: One of the most difficult tasks is to maintain a constant and high framerate value, so we must optimize our code to make it as efficient as possible. It is preferable to have a decent framerate that doesn't constantly or suddenly change; for this you need to as few necessary objects moving into the scene as possible and (in the case of WebGL) try to reduce draw calls.
trans-unit.target: 最困难的任务之一是保持一个恒定的高帧率值,所以我们必须优化我们的代码,使其尽可能的高效。最好是有一个不错的帧率,而不是不断地或突然地改变;为此,你需要尽可能地减少移动到场景中的必要对象,并且(在WebGL的情况下)尽量减少绘制调用。

trans-unit.source: One of the most interesting features of the Web Audio API is the ability to extract frequency, waveform, and other data from your audio source, which can then be used to create visualizations. This article explains how, and provides a couple of basic use cases.

trans-unit.source: One overriding problem that web users have suffered with for years is loss of connectivity. The best web app in the world will provide a terrible user experience if you can’t download it. There have been various attempts to create technologies to solve this problem, as our Offline page shows, and some of the issues have been solved. But the overriding problem is that there still isn’t a good overall control mechanism for asset caching and custom network requests.
trans-unit.target: 网络用户多年来遭受的一个首要问题是失去连接。如果您无法下载，世界上最好的Web应用程序将提供可怕的用户体验。正如我们的离线页面所示，已经进行了各种尝试来创建技术来解决该问题，并且已经解决了一些问题。但是最重​​要的问题是，对于资产缓存和自定义网络请求，仍然没有一个好的总体控制机制。

trans-unit.source: One scenario in which this is helpful is to support adapting the media source to changing bandwidth availability, by transitioning from one codec to another as resource constraints change.
trans-unit.target: 这一点很有帮助的一种情况是,随着资源限制的变化,通过从一个编解码器过渡到另一个编解码器,支持媒体源适应带宽可用性的变化。

trans-unit.source: One technique for preventing things like pinchZoom on a page is to call preventDefault() on the second touch in a series. This behavior is not well defined in the touch events spec, and results in different behavior for different browsers (i.e., iOS will prevent zooming but still allow panning with both fingers; Android will allow zooming but not panning; Opera and Firefox currently prevent all panning and zooming.) Currently, it's not recommended to depend on any particular behavior in this case, but rather to depend on meta viewport to prevent zooming.
trans-unit.target: 一种防止在页面上出现诸如 pinchZoom 之类的技术的方法是在系列的第二次触摸中调用 preventDefault() 。此行为在触摸事件规范中没有很好定义，并且导致不同浏览器具有不同的行为（即，iOS将阻止缩放但仍然允许用两只手平移； Android将允许缩放但不能平移； Opera和Firefox当前阻止所有平移和缩放。）目前，不建议在这种情况下依赖于任何特定行为，而应依赖元视口以防止缩放。

trans-unit.source: One thing that may not be clear in this example is the use of the pendingUpdate flag and the call to requestAnimationFrame(). The pendingUpdate flag serves to prevent multiple invocations of the transfrom that can occur when onresize and onscroll fire at the same time. Using requestAnimationFrame() ensures that the transform ocurrs before the next render.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中可能不清楚的一件事是使用 pendingUpdate 标志和对 requestAnimationFrame() 的调用。该 pendingUpdate 标志用来防止可能发生的当transfrom的多次调用 onresize 和 onscroll 在同一时间起火。使用 requestAnimationFrame() 可确保在下一次渲染之前发生转换。

trans-unit.source: One thing the Intersection Observer API can't tell you: the exact number of pixels that overlap or specifically which ones they are; however, it covers the much more common use case of "If they intersect by somewhere around N%, I need to do something."
trans-unit.target: Intersection Observer API不能告诉您的一件事：重叠的像素的确切数量或确切地说是它们的像素；但是，它涵盖了更常见的用例：“如果它们相交于N％左右的某个位置，则我需要做些事情。”

trans-unit.source: One thing we want to be able to do is update our document with log output and progress information. However, you can't safely change the DOM from within an idle callback. Instead, we'll use requestAnimationFrame() to ask the browser to call us when it's safe to update the display.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望能够做的一件事是使用日志输出和进度信息来更新我们的文档。但是，您不能从空闲回调中安全地更改DOM。取而代之的是，我们将使用 requestAnimationFrame() 要求浏览器在安全更新显示内容时调用我们。

trans-unit.source: One useful technique to employ is customizing the payment request button depending on whether users can make payments.
trans-unit.target: 一个有用的技术是根据用户是否可以支付来定制支付请求按钮。

trans-unit.source: One very experimental feature of streams is the ability to pipe streams into one another (called a pipe chain). This involves two methods — ReadableStream.pipeThrough(), which pipes a readable stream through a writer/reader pair to transform one data format into another, and ReadableStream.pipeTo(), which pipes a readable stream to a writer acting as an end point for the pipe chain.
trans-unit.target: 流的一个非常实验性的特征是能够将流彼此管道连接（称为管道链）。这涉及两种方法： ReadableStream.pipeThrough() 通过读取器/读取器对通过管道传递可读流，以将一种数据格式转换为另一种数据格式； ReadableStream.pipeTo() 将通过读取器的可读流通过管道传递给作为终点的写入器。用于管链。

trans-unit.source: One very useful function, which doesn't actually draw anything but becomes part of the path list described above, is the moveTo() function. You can probably best think of this as lifting a pen or pencil from one spot on a piece of paper and placing it on the next.
trans-unit.target: moveTo() 函数是一个非常有用的函数，它实际上不会绘制任何内容，但会成为上述路径列表的一部分。您可能最能想到的是将笔或铅笔从一张纸上的一个地方提起，然后放在另一张纸上。

trans-unit.source: One way to think about arcTo() is to imagine two straight segments: one from the starting point to a first control point, and another from there to a second control point. Without arcTo(), these two segments would form a sharp corner: arcTo() creates a circular arc that fits this corner and smooths is out. In other words, the arc is tangential to both segments.
trans-unit.target: 考虑 arcTo() 的一种方法是想象两个直线段：一个从起点到第一个控制点，另一个从那里到第二个控制点。如果没有 arcTo() ，则这两个段将形成一个尖角： arcTo() 创建一个适合此角的圆弧并平滑。换句话说，弧线与两个线段相切。

trans-unit.source: One way to use the OffscreenCanvas API, is to use a RenderingContext that has been obtained from an OffscreenCanvas object to generate new frames. Once a new frame has finished rendering in this context, the transferToImageBitmap() method can be called to save the most recent rendered image. This method returns an ImageBitmap object, which can be used in a variety of Web APIs and also in a second canvas without creating a transfer copy.
trans-unit.target: 使用 OffscreenCanvas API的一种方法是使用从 OffscreenCanvas 对象获得的 RenderingContext 生成新帧。一旦在此上下文中完成新帧的渲染，就可以调用 transferToImageBitmap() 方法以保存最新的渲染图像。此方法返回一个 ImageBitmap 对象，该对象可以在各种Web API和第二个画布中使用，而无需创建传输副本。

trans-unit.source: Only one payment request can be in the process of being handled at once, across all documents. Once one PaymentRequest's show() method has been called, any other call to show() will by rejected with an AbortError until the returned promise has been concluded, either by being fulfilled with a PaymentResponse indicating the results of the payment request, or by being rejected with an error.
trans-unit.target: 所有文件中一次只能处理一个付款请求。一旦 PaymentRequest 的 show() 方法，将通过 AbortError 拒绝对 show() 的任何其他调用，直到返回的诺言结束为止，或者通过显示付款请求结果的 PaymentResponse 来实现，或者被错误拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Only one reader can read a stream at a time; when a reader is created and starts reading a stream (an active reader), we say it is locked to it. If you want another reader to start reading your stream, you typically need to cancel the first reader before you do anything else (although you can tee streams, see the Teeing section below)
trans-unit.target: 一次只能读取一个流。当创建阅读器并开始阅读流（活动的Reader）时，我们说它已被锁定。如果想要另一个读者开始阅读流，通常需要你做任何事情之前，取消第一个读者（虽然可以发球流，请参见下面的发球节）

trans-unit.source: Only used for senders whose track's kind is "video", this is a double-precision floating-point value specifying a scaling factor to apply while encoding the video. The default value, 1.0, means that the sent video's size will be the same as the original. A value of 2.0 scales the video frames down by a factor of 2 in each dimension, resulting in a video 1/4 the size of the original. The value must not be less than 1.0.
